species.name: Teiú
species.use: Topical use of teiú fat has anti-inflammatory effects, reducing ear swelling in rat models caused by various inflammatory agents.
species.source: W. M. S. Souto et al. – Uso de fauna medicinal no Brasil

species.name: Boa Constrictor
species.use: Boa constrictor fat shows synergistic activity with antibiotics, though it has no bactericidal activity alone.
species.source: W. M. S. Souto et al. – Uso de fauna medicinal no Brasil
